officialTitle: The Effect of Cetirizine on Bronchoconstriction in Patients With Allergic Rhinitis and Wheezing in the Pediatric Emergency Department
inclusionCriteria:
* History of allergic rhinitis
* Wheezing
* Must have minimum age of 6 Years
* Must have maximum age of 20 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Use of antihistamine within the past 72 hours
* Chronic Pulmonary Condition other than asthma
* Other contraindication to cetirizine
* Severe asthma exacerbation requiring resuscitation
